text:
-dE#na(gm) sauSravaqsAya# jinvati || 
yaddhaqviShya#mRutuqSO dE#vaqyAnaqM trirmAnu#ShAqH paryaSvaqM naya#nti | 
atrA# pUqShNaH pra#thaqmO BAqga E#ti yaqj~jaM dEqvEBya#H prativEqdaya#nnaqjaH || 
hOtA$&ddhvaqryurAva#yA agnimiqndhO grA#vagrAqBa uqta Sa(gg)stAq suvi#praH | 
tEna# yaqj~jEnaq sva#raMkRutEnaq svi#ShTEna vaqkShaNAq A pRu#NaddhvaM || 
yUqpaqvraqskA uqta yE yU#pavAqhAScaqShAlaqM ~MyE a#SvayUqpAyaq takSha#ti | 
yE cArva#tEq paca#na(gm) saqBaMra#ntyuqtO - [  ] 40
